CALL_INFO_STORAGE_FILE - Static variable in class at.ac.univie.bachelorarbeit.ss18.calltranscriber.activities.MainActivity
Path of the callInfo file, in which all information about every recorded call is saved.
CallActivity - Class in at.ac.univie.bachelorarbeit.ss18.calltranscriber.activities
This class is for showing the information for a single call, where the user can: .)Playback the recorded call .)Delete this call .)Transcribe the recorded call .)Share the recorded call and its transcript, if one has been already created
CallActivity() - Constructor for class at.ac.univie.bachelorarbeit.ss18.calltranscriber.activities.CallActivity
 
CallActivity.TranscriptionTask - Class in at.ac.univie.bachelorarbeit.ss18.calltranscriber.activities
Will be used to create the transcript.
CallBroadcastReceiver - Class in at.ac.univie.bachelorarbeit.ss18.calltranscriber.recorder
Will start the recording service in the class RecordService whenever the user calls someone or gets called.

CallInfo - Class in at.ac.univie.bachelorarbeit.ss18.calltranscriber.model
Represents a call with all its necessary information.
